Àtụ:MedalTableTop
Vida Bruce bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Ghana lara ezumike nká.

O ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 100 mita relay na na afọ 2002 African Championships, ma sọkwara mpi na 100 mita na 200 mita n'otu ihe omume ahụ n'erughị nke ikpeazụ. N'oge asọmpi nke abụọ nke TrafieCall na afọ 2002, Vida gara n'enweghị ihe ịma aka na 100 na 200 mita ma setịpụ ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 12.09 sekọnd, na-eti ihe ndekọ ya gara aga nke 12.14 sekọnd.
